title: Changes in attractive forces when water vaporizes

content.prompt: Which of the following describes the changes in forces of attraction that occur as H2O changes phase from a liquid to a vapor?

choices.label: H – O bonds break as H – H and O – O bonds form.
Hydrogen bonds between H2O molecules are broken.
Covalent bonds between H2O molecules are broken.
Ionic bonds between H+ ions and OH- ions are broken.
